Wisdom: اجْعَلْ هَمَّكَ وَجِدَّكَ لِآخِرَتِكَ
enWisdom: Place your concern and effort for your Hereafter

Wisdom: اجْعَلْ هَمَّكَ لِمَعَادِكَ تَصْلَحْ
enWisdom: Be concerned about your Hereafter and you will become upright

Wisdom: اسْتَفْرِغْ جُهْدَكَ لِمَعَادِكَ تَصْلُحْ مَثْوَاكَ وَلَا تَبِعْ آخِرَتَكَ بِدُنْيَاكَ
enWisdom: Exert all your effort for your afterlife and your [final] station will be improved, and do not sell your Hereafter for your worldly life

Wisdom: اجْعَلْ كُلَّ هَمِّكَ وَسَعْيِكَ لِلْخَلَاصِ مِنْ مَحَلِّ الشَّقَاءِ وَالْعِقَابِ وَالنَّجَاةِ مِنْ مُقَامِ الْبَلَاءِ وَالْعَذَابِ
enWisdom: Put all your effort and endeavour in gaining salvation from the place of wretchedness and punishment and deliverance from the place of tribulation and chastisement

Wisdom: اجْعَلْ هَمَّكَ لِآخِرَتِكَ وَحُزْنَكَ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ فَكَمْ مِنْ حَزِينٍ وَفَدَ بِهِ حُزْنُهُ عَلَى سُرُورِ الْأَبَدِ وَكَمْ مِنْ مَهْمُومٍ أَدْرَكَ أَمَلَهُ
enWisdom: Let your concern be for your Hereafter and your sorrow be for your soul for how many of the sorrowful have been led to everlasting bliss by their sorrow, and how many of the distressed have attained their aspiration

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْمَرْءَ قَدْ يَسُرُّهُ دَرْكُ مَا لَمْ يَكُنْ لِيَفُوتَهُ وَيَسُوؤُهُ فَوْتُ مَا لَمْ يَكُنْ لِيُدْرِكَهُ فَلْيَكُنْ سُرُورُكَ بِمَا نِلْتَ مِنْ آخِرَتِكَ وَلْيَكُنْ أَسَفُكَ عَلَى مَا فَاتَكَ مِنْهَا وَلْيَكُنْ هَمُّكَ فِيهَا لِمَا بَعْدَ الْمَوْتِ
enWisdom: A man may be happy to gain what he was not meant to lose, and [he may be] saddened to lose what he was not meant to gain; so let your happiness be in that which you have acquired for your Hereafter and let your sadness be in that which you have lost from it; and let your concern be for that which comes after death

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ فِي سَبِيلِ مَنْ كَانَ قَبْلَكَ فَاجْعَلْ جِدَّكَ لِآخِرَتِكَ وَلَا تَكْتَرِثْ بِعَمَلِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Verily you are following the path of those who came before you, so put your efforts in [working for] your Hereafter and do not care for worldly gain

Wisdom: مَنْ جَعَلَ كُلَّ هَمِّهِ لِآخِرَتِهِ ظَفِرَ بِالْمَأْمُولِ
enWisdom: One whose entire concern is for his Hereafter attains what he hopes for

Wisdom: مَنْ رَغِبَ فِيهَا عِنْدَ اللَّهِ بَلَغَ آمَالَهُ
enWisdom: One who desires that which is with Allah attains his hopes

Wisdom: مَنْ كَانَتِ الْآخِرَةُ هِمَّتَهُ بَلَغَ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ غَايَةَ أُمْنِيَّتِهِ
enWisdom: One whose efforts are for the Hereafter will attain the best of his aspired goals

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَكُنْ هَمُّهُ مَا عِنْدَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ لَمْ يُدْرِكْ مُنَاهُ
enWisdom: One whose concern is not for [attaining] that which is with Allah, the Glorified, does not realize his aspiration

Wisdom: مَنْ أَمَّلَ ثَوَابَ الْحُسْنَى لَمْ تُنَكِّدْ آمَالَهُ
enWisdom: One who hopes to attain the bountiful rewards [of the Hereafter] will not have his hopes disappointed

Wisdom: الْآخِرَةُ فَوْزُ السُّعَدَاءِ
enWisdom: The Hereafter is the victory of the felicitous

Wisdom: ذَرْ مَا قَلَّ لِمَا كَثُرَ وَمَا ضَاقَ لِمَا اتَّسَعَ
enWisdom: Leave that which is little for that which is abundant and that which is limited for that which is vast

Wisdom: طَالِبُ الْآخِرَةِ يُدْرِكُ مِنْهَا أَمَلَهُ وَيَأْتِيهِ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا مَا قُدِّرَ لَهُ
enWisdom: The seeker of the Hereafter finds in it what he hopes for, whereas in this world [only] that which is predestined for him comes to him

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالْآخِرَةِ تَأْتِكَ الدُّنْيَا صَاغِرَةً
enWisdom: Seek the Hereafter and the world will come to you belittled

Wisdom: كُلُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ مِنَ الْآخِرَةِ عَيَانُهُ أَعْظَمُ مِنْ سَمَاعِهِ
enWisdom: Everything in the Hereafter is greater when seen than when heard of

Wisdom: كُونُوا عَنِ الدُّنْيَا نُزَّاهاً وَإِلَى الْآخِرَةِ وُلَّاهاً
enWisdom: Become uninterested in this world and be infatuated with the Hereafter

Wisdom: مَنْ حَرَصَ عَلَى الْآخِرَةِ مَلَكَ
enWisdom: One who is desirous of the Hereafter [and works for it] attains it

Wisdom: مَا أَعْظَمَ نِعَمَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَمَا أَصْغَرَهَا فِي نِعَمِ الْآخِرَةِ
enWisdom: How great are the blessings of Allah, the Glorified, in this world, yet how small they are in comparison to the blessings of the Hereafter

Wisdom: مَا دُنْيَاكَ الَّتِي تَحَبَّبَتْ إِلَيْكَ بِخَيْرٍ مِنَ الْآخِرَةِ الَّتِي قَبَّحَهَا سُوءُ النَّظَرِ عَنْكَ
enWisdom: This world of yours which endears itself to you is not better than the Hereafter which is made to appear ugly by your negative perception [of it]

Wisdom: مَا أَخْسَرَ مَنْ لَيْسَ لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ نَصِيبٌ
enWisdom: How great a loser is the one for whom there is no share in the Hereafter!

Wisdom: مَا بَالُكُمْ تَفْرَحُونَ بِالْيَسِيرِ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا تُدْرِكُونَهُ وَلَا يَحْزُنُكُمُ الْكَثِيرُ مِنَ الْآخِرَةِ تُحْرَمُونَهُ
enWisdom: What is the matter with you? You are delighted with the little of this world that you obtain while you are not saddened by the abundance of the Hereafter that you are deprived of?!

Wisdom: مَوْتَاتُ الدُّنْيَا أَهْوَنُ مِنْ مَوْتَاتِ الْآخِرَةِ
enWisdom: The deaths of this world are easier to bear than the deaths [and chastisements] of the Hereafter

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِلَى الْآخِرَةِ صَائِرُونَ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ مُعْرَضُونَ
enWisdom: Verily you are all proceeding towards the Hereafter and will be presented before Allah
